** Recent publications - PubMed **

  1. Effect of Time to Thrombolysis on Clinical Outcomes in Patients with Acute Ischemic Stroke Treated with Tenecteplase Compared to Alteplase: Analysis from the AcT Randomized Controlled Trial - Published on May 19, 2023.

  2. Early identification of NORSE and transfer to care setting with appropriate supports: A proposed algorithm - Published on April 11, 2023.

  3. AcT Trial: Protocol for a Pragmatic Registry-Linked Randomized Clinical Trial - Published on September 1, 2022.

  4. Alteplase Compared to Tenecteplase in patients with Acute Ischemic Stroke (AcT) Trial: Protocol for a Pragmatic Registry linked Randomized Clinical Trial - Published on May 6, 2022.

  5. Team debriefs during the COVID-19 pandemic in long-term care homes - Published on December 1, 2021.

  6. Frequency selective neuronal modulation triggers spreading depolarizations in the rat endothelin-1 model of stroke - Published on May 9, 2021.

  7. Integrating New Staff into Endovascular Stroke-Treatment Workflows in the COVID-19 Pandemic - Published on October 8, 2020.

  8. Crisis Resource Management and High-Performing Teams in Hyperacute Stroke Care - Published on August 13, 2020.

  9. The Dysfunction is in the Details: Neurovascular Changes in COVID-19 - Published on July 15, 2020.

  10. Pandemic Guidance for Stroke Centers Aiding COVID-19 Treatment Teams - Published on June 23, 2020.

  11. Modification to Neurology Residency Training: The Toronto Neurology COVID-19 Pandemic Experience - Published on June 19, 2020.

  12. The Virtual Neurologic Exam: Instructional Videos and Guidance for the COVID-19 Era - Published on May 21, 2020.

  13. Protected Code Stroke - Published on April 1, 2020.

SiLab (Stroke Innovation Lab) is the lab website of Dr. Khosravani, highlighting our initiatives, projects, and blog site related to stroke and critical care/neurocritical care.
